binding:binding.name: ctrlHome Binding
binding:binding.description: This is the binding for ctrlHome. ctrlHome implements Homie, an MQTT convention for the IoT

parameter.name: mqttBrokerUrl
parameter.label: MQTT Broker URL
parameter.description: MQTT Broker URL in the following format: "tcp://myBrokerHost:1883"

parameter.name: mqttBaseTopic
parameter.label: MQTT Base Topic
parameter.description: Topic under which all your devices are located. If e.g. your device sends to homie/mydevice-1/$online, your baseTopic is "homie/"
